heroSlides.caption: Court Hire
heroSlides.description: Book our world-class courts for singles, doubles, or group play. Enjoy premium facilities and easy online booking.

heroSlides.caption: Academy
heroSlides.description: Join our academy for professional coaching, skill development, and fun training sessions for all ages.

heroSlides.caption: Social
heroSlides.description: Meet, play, and socialize with other club members. Friendly games, refreshments, and networking every month.

heroSlides.caption: 1 - on 1 Training
heroSlides.description: Personalized coaching sessions to help you reach your badminton goals. Flexible scheduling available.

heroSlides.caption: Competition Training

heroSlides.caption: QBA Club Membership

about.title: About Us
about.description: Brisbane Badminton is dedicated to providing the best badminton experience in Queensland. Our club welcomes players of all ages and skill levels, offering world-class facilities, professional coaching, and a vibrant community.

features.title: Premium Courts
features.description: Enjoy playing on courts with soft cushion flooring, professional lighting, and the highest ceiling in Queensland.

features.title: Expert Coaching
features.description: Our certified coaches help you improve your game, whether you’re a beginner or a competitive player.

features.title: Community Events
features.description: Participate in tournaments, socials, and events for all ages and abilities.

services.title: Court Hire
services.description:
Book our world-class courts at your convenience.
Our facility features high-quality flooring, lighting, and equipment for an optimal playing experience. Courts are available for singles, doubles, and group bookings. Reserve online and enjoy hassle-free access for practice or matches.(Non Marking Shoes Only)

services.title: QBA Membership
services.description: South Brisbane Badminton Inc. is proud to be affiliated with the Queensland Badminton Association (QBA). Becoming a QBA member not only supports the growth of badminton in Queensland but also allows you to compete in official state-level tournaments and includes insurance coverage during these competitions.

services.title: Restringing
services.description:
Top-quality restringing service with fast turnaround.
We use premium strings and professional techniques to ensure your racket performs at its best. Our experts can advise on string tension and type for your playing style. Drop off your racket and pick it up ready for your next match!

services.title: Personal Training
services.description:
Personal coaching sessions tailored to your skill level.
Our certified coaches focus on technique, strategy, and fitness. Whether you’re a beginner or advanced player, we help you reach your goals with customized drills and feedback. Flexible scheduling available for busy lifestyles.

services.title: Social
services.description:
Meet, play and socialize with other club members.
Our socials are open to all skill levels and ages. Enjoy friendly games, refreshments, and networking opportunities. Special events and tournaments are held regularly to foster community and fun.

services.title: Academy
services.description:
Train young champions with certified coaches.
Our academy focuses on skill development, teamwork, and sportsmanship. Programs are designed for different age groups and abilities. Kids learn through fun drills, games, and competitions in a safe environment.

programs12.title: Beginner Batches (Age 6+)
programs12.description: Perfect for young players starting their badminton journey. Focus on basic skills, rules, and fun drills.

programs12.title: Intermediate Coaching
programs12.description: Refining skills and game strategies for intermediate players. Includes match play and tactical sessions.

programs12.title: Advanced Player Training
programs12.description: Intensive training designed for competitive athletes. Personalized feedback and advanced techniques.

programs12.title: Aglity and speed
programs12.description: Improve speed, strength, and endurance for peak performance. Includes footwork, and techniques.

programs12.title: Tournament Prep
programs12.description: Specialized coaching for players preparing for tournaments. Mental preparation, strategy, and match simulation.

coaches.name: Arthur Lee
acheivements: 2021 City of Brisbane Champion AMS Champion

trainingPlan: Week 1 - Week 4: Basic skills, special fitness, physical fitness, game rules, game play
Week 6 - Week 7: Training Development & Player Assessment
Week 8 - Week 9: Game knowledge & Match development, Competition preparation
Week 10: Internal Academy Competition 20/09 Saturday & 21/09 Sunday
info.kidsFees: Term Training Fee: $375/term/student/lesson/week | Casual/Trial lesson Fee: $50/session (2 Hrs.)/student
info.adultFees: Term Training Fee: $375/term/student/lesson/week | Casual/Trial lesson Fee: $50/session (2 Hrs.)/student
notices: Term fee $375 is only applicable for the students enrolling 10 weeks program (within their enrolled day) which is non-refundable or redeemable to any other forms of service
Students enrolling other than Term Training is considered as CASUAL enrollment with $50/lesson/student
All the makeup lesson must be completed within the enrolled term
A make-up lesson must be scheduled within the enrolled term and must be requested within AT LEAST 24 hours of notice.
A student is allowed to schedule up to 3 make-up lessons over term training.
Brisbane Badminton may request a medical certificate if a student is sick on a training day and requests a make-up lesson within LESS THAN 24 hours of notice.
Student should bring their own Badminton Racquet, Sport Shoe (no black sole), Water/Drink bottle.
Training arrangements are made accordingly if any events are hosted in the facility.
Further notices will be informed and discussed in the WhatsApp group/E-mail or DM Parent/Student.

info.title: Personal Training
info.description: Get personalized coaching to improve your skills and performance. Our expert coaches will work with you one-on-one to develop a training plan tailored to your needs.

info.title: Court Hire Information
info.description: Book our Brisbane highest ceiling badminton courts today and take your game to the next level!
features: High-quality indoor courts with professional flooring and lighting.
Courts are badminton shoes only for safety and surface protection.
Hire court to play with friends or organizing your socials.
Courts can be booked online and offline at the center.
If you don't have badminton shoes, you can buy a pair at our pro shop located at the badminton center.
Available for singles, doubles, and group bookings.
Free parking and easy access from major roads.
Refreshments and equipment available at our pro shop.
Special rates for club members and regular players.
notes: Whether you're practicing, playing a friendly match, or hosting a tournament, our courts provide the perfect environment for all skill levels.
For group bookings, events, or regular sessions, please contact our team for custom packages and support.

terms: All players must use only BADMINTON SHOES or Non marking shoes at Brisbane Badminton.
People wearing shoes with black sole/bottom (including partially black) will not be allowed to play on our courts (no refunds of court booking).
People wearing any other shoes which can make any colored marks (including white marks) on the mats will not be allowed to play on our courts.
If you are unsure about your shoes, they are most likely Marking Shoes.
Any breach of this rule will incur management fee start from $150 (Must pay before leaving the Center).

Court Arrangements: Please note that courts for your booking may be adjusted for better utilisation of the facility. You'll be notified through the booking system if there are any changes. Kindly check your booking again on the day. If you do not wish to be moved, please notify us through the comment section upon making your bookings.
All customers are obligated to step off the court at the end of your booking hours; Any extended time of using the court may be charged.
Please read our Booking Rules including Cancellation Policy.
No Outside coaches are allowed to do any sort of coaching in Brisbane Badminton premises.

about.title: About the Club
about.description:
Our club is dedicated to creating a friendly and supportive environment for badminton enthusiasts of all levels.
    Whether you're a beginner or an advanced player, you'll find the perfect place to grow your skills and enjoy the sport with others.

qba.title: QBA Membership
qba.description: South Brisbane Badminton Inc. is proud to be affiliated with the Queensland Badminton Association (QBA). Becoming a QBA member not only supports the growth of badminton in Queensland but also allows you to compete in official state-level tournaments and includes insurance coverage during these competitions.
qba.courtDescription: Play on our badminton courts, featuring the highest ceiling in Queensland, soft cushion flooring, and the brightest lights for unmatched comfort, performance, and safety. With top-tier flooring, professional lighting, and quality equipment, our facility offers the perfect environment for both casual play and serious training.
qba.bookingNote: Reserve your court online for a smooth, hassle-free experience. Whether you're training, competing, or just having fun—South Brisbane Badminton Inc. is the place to be.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
items: All players must use only BADMINTON SHOES or Non marking shoes at Brisbane Badminton.
People wearing shoes with black sole/bottom (including partially black) will not be allowed to play on our courts (no refunds of court booking).
People wearing any other shoes which can make any colored marks (including white marks) on the mats will not be allowed to play on our courts.
If you are unsure about your shoes, they are most likely Marking Shoes.
Any breach of this rule will incur management fee start from $150 (Must pay before leaving the Center).

Court Arrangements: Please note that courts for your booking may be adjusted for better utilisation of the facility. You'll be notified through the booking system if there are any changes. Kindly check your booking again on the day. If you do not wish to be moved, please notify us through the comment section upon making your bookings.
All customers are obligated to step off the court at the end of your booking hours; Any extended time of using the court may be charged.
Please read our Booking Rules including Cancellation Policy.
No Outside coaches are allowed to do any sort of coaching in Brisbane Badminton premises.

facilities.title: Indoor Courts
facilities.description: Play in our state-of-the-art indoor courts, designed for the best badminton experience.

facilities.title: QBA Club Members
facilities.description: Join our vibrant community of badminton enthusiasts and make new friends. Club memberships are open for all skill levels. Just $99 per year. Contact us to join and enjoy exclusive member benefits, priority court bookings, and access to club tournaments and socials.

facilities.title: Pro Shop
facilities.description: Get all your badminton gear and accessories from our well-stocked pro shop. We offer rackets, shoes, shuttlecocks, apparel, and expert advice for players of all levels.

benefits: Ability to participate in all sanctioned tournaments and regional affiliated club activities
Insurance coverage for injuries occurring at QBA sanctioned tournaments and affiliated clubs
Priority access to special opportunities involving international tournaments, coaching seminars and social events hosted by the QBA
Opportunity to represent Queensland in national competitions at junior and senior levels

events.title: Academy Tournament
events.description: Join our academy tournament to test your skills against fellow players. Open to all academy members, this event is a great opportunity to showcase your progress and compete in a friendly environment. Prizes for winners!

events.title: Social
events.description: A casual meet-up for members to socialize, play badminton, and have fun. Enjoy refreshments, friendly matches, and networking opportunities in a relaxed setting.

socials.title: Badminton Night
socials.description: Join us for a casual night of badminton! Meet new people, play friendly matches, and enjoy snacks and drinks.

socials.title: Adult Socials
socials.description: A charity event to raise funds for local youth badminton programs. Compete and contribute to a good cause!

socials.title: Kids Socials
socials.description: A day for the entire family! Come for a friendly tournament, activities for all ages, and delicious food and beverages.

socials.title: Family Fun Day
socials.description: A day of fun for the whole family! Enjoy badminton games, food stalls, and activities for kids.

socials.title: Charity Tournament
socials.description: A charity event to raise funds for local youth badminton programs. Compete and contribute to a good cause!
